pullRequest.title: fix: Vaadin.Flow.clients.TypeScript.isActive for endpoint requests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Allows TestBench tests to assume that all initial endpoint requests have
completed before the test case is executed.

commit.message:
fix: Vaadin.Flow.clients.TypeScript.isActive will be true when endpoint requests active

This allows TestBench tests to assume that all initial endpoint requests have
completed before the test case is executed.

nodes.bodyText: We should be able to assume that $wnd.Vaadin.connectionState is defined here, the if guards were there previously only to make a test (ConnectTests: should set header for preventing CSRF using Flow csrfToken) pass. This is now corrected in the test instead.
This is the test correction mentioned in the previous comment.
